pages.text: The Endergetic Expansion (or just Endergetic) adds a biome that livens up the End a bit. The Poise Forest features trees like no other and some very unique mobs.

Bolloom Fruit, found in the Poise forest, is a unique that give Levitation when consumed. They can be given to Booflos to tame them. Just make sure you feed them one Bolloom fruit at a time.$(br2)Puff Bugs will come around and pollinate Bolloom Buds, so don't worry if they aren't growing.

Tamed Booflos can be ridden and controlled without a saddle, but be weary as they have an unorthodox method of getting around. Two Tamed Booflos can be bred with Poise Clusters, but as you'd expect from such a strange creature, they don't reproduce like other mobs. Booflo tadpoles will grow on one of your Booflo's back, and fly off!
Booflos drop Booflo Hide, and with a total of 16 hides, one can make a Booflo Vest. While it doesn't provide much protection, you can jump in the air $(bold)six$() times while wearing it!
